updates.HtmlString: Updated marketing cards to be more accurate for set, plus set chances as 1:3 token:marketing for core sets, 2:3 for expansions, and 9:1 as of Battle for Zendikar.
Updated foil chances. Now 15/67 chance a booster has a foil.
Token no longer show up in common slot (oops).
Fixed Bloodflow Connoisseur type, fixed promos/rules cards showing up as booster foils.
Fixed rarity on Temporal Manipulation and all Box Toppers.
